mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( MEMBERID, MEMBERPW, MEMBERNAME, MEMBERBIRTHDAY, MEMBERPHONE, MEMBERADDR, JOINDAY, LIBCODE, RENTALCOUNT, MEMBERPAYMENTSTATUS ) VALUES ( #{MEMBER_ID}, #{MEMBER_PW}, #{MEMBER_NAME}, #{MEMBER_BIRTHDAY}, #{MEMBER_PHONE}, #{MEMBER_ADDR}, now(), #{LIB_CODE}, #{RENTAL_COUNT}, #{MEMBER_PAYMENTSTATUS} );
